body_html:
I think you are looking at the btl subset of eigen.
From eigen website, I see that they also have GPLv3 license for the general package:
https://github.com/eigenteam/eigen-git-mirror/blob/master/COPYING.GPL
https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/src/36d65672189a71a100340c1f675f763fd50d9e37/COPYING.GPL?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default

but it looks like later versions of eigen changed to MPLv2.
@rmlarsen @benoitsteiner , do the code under eigen3 we have come from head of eigen, or the files we have under eigen3 are a subset of eigen that have a different license?

body:
I think you are looking at the btl subset of eigen.
From eigen website, I see that they also have GPLv3 license for the general package:
https://github.com/eigenteam/eigen-git-mirror/blob/master/COPYING.GPL
https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/src/36d65672189a71a100340c1f675f763fd50d9e37/COPYING.GPL?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default

but it looks like later versions of eigen changed to MPLv2. 
@rmlarsen @benoitsteiner , do the code under eigen3 we have come from head of eigen, or the files we have under eigen3 are a subset of eigen that have a different license?
